title: OEC to export Engineers to KSA
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 12 (APP):Overseas Employment Corporation (OEC), an attached department of the Ministry of Overseas Pakistanis and Human Resource Development (MOP&HRD), would export the Engineers to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia on an urgent basis.
An official source told APP here on Thursday, he said that the our esteemed client in KSA required the services of Pakistani engineers who meet the prescribed qulalification and experience as Bachelor of Science degree in Electronics/Electrical Engineering or Radar Technology, specialized training and certification in each area of expertise with Radars or/C2, must be qualified and specialized in the GM200 Radar and CONTROL View SHIKRA
equipment, hardware, software, operations, and maintenance. (Training certificate to be provided
from France post-hiring phase) and who can speak English (French & Arabic are an advantage) with excellent communication and interpersonal relationship management skills.
He said that the expert (RAPID Ranger) System Engineer with Bachelor of Science degree in Electronics/Electrical Engineering or Weapon Technology, Specialized training and certification in each area of expertise with Weapon system
and associated equipment, Must be qualified and specialized on the RAPID Ranger module equipment,
hardware and software, operations and maintenance. (Training certificate from UK after hiring) with speak English (French & Arabic are an advantage) with excellent communication skills are eligible for the jobs.
Maintenance Technician with having Senior Technician diploma in Electro-mechanics / Electricity, Specialized training and certification in each area of expertise with Radars or/and C2 in general, Must be qualified and specialized in the GM200 Radar and Control View equipment, hardware and software, operations and maintenance. (Training certificate from France after the hiring phase).
Networking Engineer, Architect, systems installation manager, Cisco Unified
communications engineer, systems engineer, minimum qualifications: Bachelor’s in Software / Electronic / Computer / IT or relevant Engineering.
Salary and other terms & conditions will be decided at the time of the Interview. Interested applicants can apply via OEC’s website https://oec.gov.pk/.
